name: labratorium-ai-prompt-optimizer
description: Privacy-focused Chrome extension for optimizing AI prompts using Claude API

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run minify
scripts.minify: npm run minify-js && npm run minify-html
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch . --ext js,html,json --ignore node_modules --exec 'echo File changed at $(date)'
scripts.reload-extension: echo 'Extension reloaded' && curl -s http://localhost:3000/reload || echo 'Dev server not running'

author: Labratorium.com
